This game is awesome. Why?
- I played this game 11 times - never gets old (probably because of my ADHD, BUT THAT ISNT'T THE POINT.)
- It involves revolutionary science and makes you think with portals. Annoyed with your relatives/friends/gf/bf bragging about how games are useless? Well let them chew on portal, how 'bout THAT. For science.
- There are workshop maps,  therefore after you complete training and become a well-qualified test subject, you can test for as long as the next 60 years straight. And even then you're likely going to be resurrected for further testing.
- There is a slight probability you are going to be seduced by a turkey leg on a string. Don't fall for it.
- The cake is a lie. Once again.

Jogo excelente e desafiador, joguei poucos minutos porém já percebo porque foi tão aclamado em seu lançamento. A capacidade de te prender e te fazer passar nivel a nivel, perdendo assim a noção do tempo é impressionante. 

Não joguei o modo Coop, porém já percebo que pode ser engraçado e divertido.

Recomendo para quem gosta de pensar e se divertir ao mesmo tempo.

Very good game, fun and challenging co-op and single player missions. If you complete the levels that came with it, then you can goto to workshop and get more levels. If you think of something the community and you can enjoy, you can create it in the inlcuded level editor. And the level editor has a very simple interface. 10/10
10/10 because it was made by Gaben.
Perfect

I thought this game was ok.  It isn't one of my favorite but I had decent fun playing.  The puzzles aren't super difficult but aren't easy.  The game is different and is fun to anyone who likes puzzle games or want a different experience with games. 7/10

I would reccomend this game to most players who feel a good, in-depth story is required in a video game, as portal 2 has one. The nice thing also is that it is not fully necessary to play portal 1 beforehand, however, dont look at spoilers, because they will ruin the story. the co-op mode is challenging, as well as the campaign, and to me, it is a classic and a must-buy for any player seeking a challenge or a good story

A visually entertaining puzzle game made by geniuses for sub-geniuses- who are very grateful. split screen this game at home with your ladyfriend, male companion, tran/pansexual, or robot and you will either argue the entire time, or have a great life-affirming gaming session followed by steamy carnal love on the rug as you ruminate on your accomplishments together as anxiety-ridden robots in a hellish nightmare future world of pipes, miles of functionless wires, metallic polygons and absolutely no trees or animals or delicious things to eat whatsoever. anywhere... never mind me. i'm just really hungry. the game is brilliant. go play it if you have somehow, like myself, been missing out on this one for a couple of years already even though it's a hugely popular game and has won a bunch of awards or whatever.
Muito louco, recomendo!
We need portal 3 guys!!!

this game is a very enjoyable game! No doubt. I have very little complaints about this game. I do honestly think that the original is better but this game is not very far behind it. This game gave me a few enjoyable hours of gameplay, and I do say, the ending is quite satisfying. Portal 2 gets an 8/10

Un juego completo y bastante divertido, tanto para un jugador como en cooperativo (los mapas son completamente distintos) y con unos comentarios y un humor muy bien desarrollados. Si te apetece dar un poco al coco mientras tiras al acido a un colega con la pistola de portales, este es tu juego XD

Esse jogo foi um dos jogos que mais gostei de zerar, uma dica, faça como eu se tiver fazes que você acha que não vai conseguir passar continue tentando, A parte mais legal do jogo não é quando você está cumprindo o que tem que fazer para terminar a sala de testes e sim quando você está tentando escapar do local e atirando portais para sobreviver, final do jogo me surpreendeu. Para quem zerou e tem amigos que tem o jogo e quer continuar se divertindo? Só se inscrever nesses três mapas de corrida que a diverão é garantida:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=91038223
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96704281
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=115869888
Recomendo a todos!!

DO NOT BUY THIS GAME! IT WILL EXPLODE YOUR BRAIN! Apart from that, it is worth your money.

Portal and Portal 2 is the one and only "Perpetual Testing Initiative" game which is a great success by Valve at exploding your brain. To win, you've got to think with Portals and potatoes and Wheatley. This game is humorous and contains a bunch on Eastereggs. What I didn't like about this game was Level 11. Wanna know why? Your gotta find out yourself. Apart from all that mumble-jumbo, I rate it 11 out of 10. Not bad when you have to work with a potato and the dumbest moron who ever lived!
Uno de los juegos que no debe faltar en la biblioteca, es estupendo en todo sentido plenamente recomendado.

One of my favorite games EVER.
Played on Xbox 360 before and re-played on PC, it never gets old, it never gets boring.
This game is near perfect for me.
The story, the characters, the gameplay, the easter eggs, the jokes, it just gets better and better the more you play it.
I personally think that if you say that you didn't like Portal 2, you're lying.
One of Valve's best works, and one of the best games out there.
And if you are asking yourself: "Why should I play this game?", as Cave Johnson would say: "Why not?"

Excelente juego.

Con los mapas de la comunidad practicamente podes jugar sin fin...

Mas que recomendado!

Portal 2 is one of my best games I have ever played (not the best but it's really close to be my top 1 game of all time). It takes all the good parts from Portal 1 and adds more to the backage, or atleast improves them. Example better graphics, better environments, better overall audio (like audio effects and sharper audio quality), deeper story (from my point of view), multiplayer (multiplayer has it's own storyline and levels) and well build menu system (it's clean and easy to understand). 

Portal 2 was my first PS3 game I got if I remember correctly and I completed it multiple times. I decided to buy it also on Steam and I wasn't disappointed. This version is basically THE BEST version of this game and it runs really well (atleast on my build I didn't have any noticeable problems or frame drops) and has workshop support. 

If you liked Portal 1, just buy this game already. If you don't own portal 1 but have Portal 2, I highly recommend you to buy that also, because both Portal 1 and Portal 2 are great games. IF you don't own any of these games, you should totally buy them both and play then in order. 

Score: I got to give this 10/10. I have literally nothing negative to say about this one. It's great.
Tan simple como: 10/10
Esto es un juegazo y lo demás son tonterías. Juega al primero y después a éste. Los puzzles son increíbles y la historia lo es más aún. Que nadie te cuente el final, si no te desgracian el juego
Best game ever. beat the storymode multiple times, and i continue to play community test chambers. buy this shit

One of the best puzzle games I have ever had the pleasure of playing, great characters, brilliant script, mind bending puzzles, and just an all round amazing game in every way possible. If you haven't played this game already then I highly suggest you do because your missing out big time. Go play, shoot Portals, face GLADOS and remember...If life gives you lemons, make lemonade...
Amazing storyline, amazing gameplay and Cave Johnson. if you don't know who Cave Johnson is then play this game.
I mean... Do I have to say anything?

If you're reading this right now, you probabally have the knowlege on what this game is, A thrifty puzzle game with an interesting portal mechanic that will tease your mind, along with the fact it has a cunning story and is a legend in the gaming industry, this game is really a sight to behold. Despite being slightly old, this game offers high quality textures and models, along with a very smooth framerate. The story is amazing, most people will agree that portal is very intriguing in the story AND the puzzles. This version of the portal franchise has a multiplayer mode and workshop created levels, so the fun never ends.

A great example of how puzzles should be done: mind-challenging, fun, containing some unique mechanics...and always being able to deliver some more! Add some nice plot, good humor and fine graphics - and you'll get Portal 2. Totally recommended to play co-op with a friend - it's literally twice as fun as it sounds like.
Awesome game, nothing more to say
The awesome game from the awesome pre-sequel!

Muito bom para quem quer exercitar o raciocínio, a inteligência e paciência! Gráficos não tão bons mas, que para esse tipo de jogo não devem ser levados em muita consideração já que o objetivo é mexer com o raciocinio durante a campanha... Jogabilidade boa e sem muitas dificuldades apesar de no inicio ser meio dificil associar botoes a comandos e açoes para quem não domina o inglês. História da campanha interessante!

The much-awaited sequel to Portal, this one adds a co-op component to the mix.  Highly advised to play the co-op with a friend, rather than a random online partner, as trying to communicate with the in-built robot-player hand-diagrams can be somewhat limited.

This one has a bigger and bolder storyline compared to its predecessor, but also adds a few new mechanics to the game.  Granted, it doesn't feel like they get used as much as they should, and they're not as nice as the base portal system, but they do add an additional level of complexity.

Also noteworthy is the custom community-made maps, so you're not limited by the standard pack of maps to play with.

Que vous aimiez ou non les puzzles games ce jeu est un chef d'oeuvre dans le genre. C'est un cas d'école de ce que devrait être un bon level design. 
Si on ajoute l'humour omniprésent (j'ai rarement autant rigolé en jouant à un jeu vidéo), le multi en coop super sympa, c'est un must have.
En plus au prix qu'il coute maintenant...
This is a great puzzle game, it gives you plenty of hours to think and have fun, the co-op is a bonus, because it makes the game 10 times better, because you can share this experience with friends

My Portal review "It seems like a simple game until you start playing it. The graphics are good but the physics are some of the best I have ever see. This is probably my most favorite puzzel game series. No two levels are the same and it will have you really thinking till the end. The story is good but no one buys this game for the story." 

It really just improved everything for Portal 2. The story and graphics are better. The physics are really great. But one thing about this one, without ruining it, it does not take the normal route that Portal level wise. I thought this was very unique. Buy it already!
